message.content:
I need to identify the total income arising in the course of the entity's ordinary activities and extract one component sub-item from the income statement.

Looking at the income statement provided:
- "Total Revenue" appears to be the line item representing total income from ordinary activities, with a value of 2869560.42
- The constituent line item is "Main Business Revenue" with the same value of 2869560.42

Based on the requirements, I need to:
1. Identify the total income value (Total Revenue: 2869560.42)
2. Decompose this into 1 component sub-item (Main Business Revenue: 2869560.42)

```json
{"solution": {'value': '2869560.42', 'sub_items': {'sub_item value': '2869560.42'}}}
```
